review: Love having the fire stick!! I'm amazed at all of the shows and movies , new and old , that we can watch!! Great product!!!

review: Love it!  Totally getting rid of cable.

review: Its great and easy to use, however I'm giving it 4 stars as I can not access my VUDU account which is definitely disappointing as this was one of the main reasons I purchased it...

review: I have a cable service and Apple TV. Once I purchased the FireStick my need for Apple TV disappeared. The FireStck has it all and a lot more to offer

review: Easy to install and allows you to watch 100's of shows and movies!

review: We are out in the country gives us additional shows and movies
